subject: Relationships
title: When to Seek a Therapist
description: A quick, practical guide to When to Seek a Therapist.

hook.text: The average couple waits six years after problems start before seeking therapy. By then, damage is deep.

buildup.text: Therapy stigma keeps couples suffering in silence. Many see it as admitting failure rather than investing in love.

discovery.text: Couples therapy has a 70% success rate when started early. It drops significantly with delayed treatment.

twist.text: The best time for therapy isn't during a crisis â€” it's before one. Prevention beats repair.

climax.text: Asking for help isn't weakness. It's recognizing that love is too important to leave to guesswork alone.

punchline.text: Therapy isn't for failing couples. It's for couples who refuse to fail.

quiz.question: How long does the average couple wait before seeking therapy?
